sentences.en: For example, in the late 1960 s women became tired of bouffant hairstyles and sought new looks.
sentences.cn: 例如在20世纪60年代后期,妇女开始对蓬松的发型感到厌倦,开始追求新的形象.

sentences.en: Her short brown hair was curled in a puffy bouffant hairdo.
sentences.cn: 她棕色的卷卷的短发蓬松鼓起.

words.tran_cn: 鼓起的，蓬松的；向外胀起的

trans.tran_cn: 张大的，鼓胀的，柔软而膨松的，百褶
trans.tran_en: a bouffant hairstyle is one in which your hair is raised away from your head at the top
